sentences.sContent: Candidates should have training and practical experience in basic electronics.
sentences.sCn: 应征者应该具备基础电子学方面的培训和实践经验。

sentences.sContent: the practical problems of old age
They provide financial and practical help for disabled students.
sentences.sCn: 他们为残障学生提供经济上的援助以及实际的帮助。

sentences.sContent: a combination of theoretical and practical training
sentences.sCn: 理论培训和实践培训的结合

sentences.sContent: They haven’t thought about the practical consequences of the new regulations.
sentences.sCn: 他们没有考虑过新法规会产生什么实际后果。

sentences.sContent: In practical terms, this means spending more time with each student.
sentences.sCn: 具体地说，这意味着花更多的时间和每个学生在一起。

phrases.pCn: 实务经验，实践经验，实际经验
实际用途；实际应用；实用
实践性知识，实用性知识；实务知识

words.tran: 可用的；行得通的；可实行的
实用性，实际性；实际，实例

trans.tranOther: relating to real situations and events rather than ideas, emotions etc
